articles.author: Joseph Ziegler
articles.description: Crater Lake’s Cleetwood Cove Trail—the only legal access to the lake—will close in 2026 for major renovations. No swimming or boating will be allowed until at least 2029, as the park improves safety, infrastructure, and the marina. 2025 will be the last chance for lake access for years.
articles.title: Crater Lake's Only Legal Access Trail to Close for Years Starting in 2026
